data.name: DeleteProfile
data.value: Are you sure you want to delete this profile?
data.comment: Confirmation message for deleting a profile

data.name: DeleteProfileWithName
data.value: Are you sure you want to delete the profile '{0}'?
data.comment: Confirmation message for deleting a specific profile. {0} is profile name

data.name: DeleteFile
data.value: Are you sure you want to delete this file?
data.comment: Confirmation message for deleting a file

data.name: DeleteFiles
data.value: Are you sure you want to delete {0} files?
data.comment: Confirmation message for deleting multiple files. {0} is file count

data.name: DeleteFolder
data.value: Are you sure you want to delete this folder and all its contents?
data.comment: Confirmation message for deleting a folder

data.name: ResetSettings
data.value: Are you sure you want to reset all settings to defaults?
data.comment: Confirmation message for resetting settings

data.name: ResetProfile
data.value: Are you sure you want to reset this profile to default settings?
data.comment: Confirmation message for resetting a profile

data.name: ResetCache
data.value: Are you sure you want to clear the cache? This cannot be undone.
data.comment: Confirmation message for clearing cache

data.name: OverwriteFile
data.value: A file with this name already exists. Do you want to overwrite it?
data.comment: Confirmation message for overwriting a file

data.name: OverwriteProfile
data.value: A profile with this name already exists. Do you want to overwrite it?
data.comment: Confirmation message for overwriting a profile

data.name: ReplaceExisting
data.value: Replace existing {0}?
data.comment: Confirmation message for replacing existing item. {0} is item type

data.name: ExitApplication
data.value: Are you sure you want to exit the application?
data.comment: Confirmation message for exiting the application

data.name: CloseWithUnsavedChanges
data.value: You have unsaved changes. Do you want to save before closing?
data.comment: Confirmation message when closing with unsaved changes

data.name: CancelOperation
data.value: Are you sure you want to cancel this operation?
data.comment: Confirmation message for canceling an operation

data.name: StopDownload
data.value: Are you sure you want to stop this download?
data.comment: Confirmation message for stopping a download

data.name: ApplyChanges
data.value: Do you want to apply these changes?
data.comment: Confirmation message for applying changes

data.name: DiscardChanges
data.value: Are you sure you want to discard all changes?
data.comment: Confirmation message for discarding changes

data.name: ProceedWithAction
data.value: Do you want to proceed with this action?
data.comment: Generic confirmation message for proceeding with an action

data.name: ContinueWithWarnings
data.value: There are warnings. Do you want to continue anyway?
data.comment: Confirmation message for continuing despite warnings

data.name: InstallUpdate
data.value: An update is available. Do you want to install it now?
data.comment: Confirmation message for installing an update

data.name: RestartToApplyUpdate
data.value: The application needs to restart to apply the update. Restart now?
data.comment: Confirmation message for restarting to apply update

data.name: ImportData
data.value: Are you sure you want to import this data? Existing data may be overwritten.
data.comment: Confirmation message for importing data

data.name: ExportData
data.value: Do you want to export this data?
data.comment: Confirmation message for exporting data
